summary: Full-Stack Developer & AI Software Engineer | Building Scalable Solutions That Drive Business Impact

education.degree: M.S. in Data Science, B.S. in Computer Science

bullets: Envisioned & engineered a **full-stack web & mobile application** (Figma, Django, React, React-Native) for auto body shops to **enhance engagement between customers and employees**, encouraging **repeat business**
New _repairs process faster_ and overall _repair times are reduced_, **saving shops time and money**

Led UX of Conflict Check **web application** (Figma, React, Django, PostgreSQL) for **150+ executives/managers**; new client leads processed up to **48 hours sooner**, reducting costs by **$3,000,000/day saved**

Developed a **React Native app** (iOS + Android) for **100+** Building Envelope inspectors featuring _speech-to-report_ (OpenAI Whisper + AWS ChatBedrock) and _DOCX/PDF generation_; reduced report writing time by **6 hours/report** saving inspectors **30 hours/week**

Build a cost-efficient **Document QA Agent** (LangChain, LangGraph, AWS ChatBedrock) for **over 14,000 employees**; generates _document summaries_ and _tables_ upon request, **bosting efficiency** and **increasing data access**
Built **customer segmentation models** for **5M+ rows** of data, each with **over 1500 features**

Created **customer segments** via _dimensionality reduction_ and _k-means clustering_; defined **segment profiles** using _statistics_ and insurance _domain knowledge_; presented **business outcomes** to executive stakeholders
Earned the **Bronze Graduate Qualifying Project Award** and **Team MVP** for our **impactful presentation**
Led **contract development** of a **commissions processing tool**; implemented a _continuous learning system_
**Reduced costs by 3x**, going from **3** accountants to only **1** system admin
Developed **3 Python Excel-automation apps** (PyQT, Pandas) and redesigned the **company website** (Wix)
Automated **data lookups** and **report generation**, saving inside sales team **10+hours/month**
Created a **commissions analysis program** to _query data upon request_, increasing **data leverage** for sales decisions
Tailored **online lesson plans** and taugh K-12 students in _math_, _science_, and _programming_
Received **5-star reviews through all my lessons**
Experience in a **high-efficiency restaurant** as burrito-roller, cashier, dish-washer, and janitor
Learned to value _hard work_ and _teamwork_
**Over 100 hours of volunteer service** teaching elementary _math_ & _English_
Paid service for _morning and after-school care_
